ratings.comment: VERY Tough Grader. Never take this prof's classes again.

Pretty much only read from a sort of "script" during lecture, but whenever they went off script, had some pretty insightful ideas. Lecture could be much more engaging if she showed a bit more interest in what she talks about, but overall decent.

Class itself was easy and overall interesting. Tests were 5 long answer questions about big ideas in class. Lectures were pretty dry, she just read from her notes w/ ppt. Discussion is extremely helpful, esp before tests. There's just a midterm and final, and if you review the main concepts and important artists/artworks, you'll be good.

Professor Murray's lecture formats are basically her reading from her notes which isn't very engaging, but if you follow your TA's guides, you'll be good for the exams. They are handwritten essay exams (approx 5 questions in 50 mins) and are on the big concepts taught. Overall, I appreciated the knowledge gained out of this class!
